title: Laboratory of Structure Formation and Properties of Ferrous Metals

firstPersonCard.name: Levchenko Gennadii Vasylovych
firstPersonCard.researchDirection: - structural heredity in steels and alloys and its influence on the formation of properties of steels and alloys. Development of methods for directed formation of structure and properties of metals. Development of complex heat treatment regimes for steels and alloys with increased wear and heat resistance.
firstPersonCard.specialization: 05.16.01 – Materials Science and Heat Treatment of Metals

staffCards.name: Bobyr Serhii Volodymyrovych
staffCards.description: Doctor of Technical Sciences, Senior Researcher
staffCards.researchDirection: Development of complex heat treatment regimes to increase wear and heat resistance of metal products in mechanical engineering. Analysis and modeling of non-equilibrium phase-structural transformations in steels and alloys. Diffusion processes in metals and alloys, further development of thermodynamic foundations of diffusion theories.
staffCards.specialization: 05.16.01 – Materials Science and Heat Treatment of Metals

staffCards.name: Borisenko Andrii Yuriiovych
staffCards.researchDirection: Mechanisms of phase transformations and formation of the internal structure of metals. Structural heredity of steel and cast iron. Development of methods for directed formation of structure and properties of metals.
staffCards.specialization: 05.16.01 – Materials Science and Heat Treatment of Metals

staffCards.name: Balakhanova Tetiana Valeriivna
staffCards.researchDirection: Optimization of the selective laser melting process to obtain materials with homogeneous microstructure, minimal defect level and a specified set of mechanical characteristics. Study and scientific substantiation of the mechanisms of defect formation in large cross-section rolled products to determine their nature and ways of minimization. Analysis of the influence of the dendritic structure of cast steel on the microstructure and operational characteristics of the finished rolled product and development of scientific approaches to improve the reliability of metal products, particularly for the railway industry.
staffCards.specialization: 05.16.01 – Materials Science and Heat Treatment of Metals

staffCards.name: Baranivska Olena Yevgenivna
staffCards.researchDirection: Hereditary connection of the primary dendritic structure with the grain structure of cast steel and finished metal products. Features of phase and structural transformations in steels and alloys with increased wear and heat resistance. Improvement of heat treatment regimes for metal products for hot deformation tools.
staffCards.specialization: 05.16.01 – Materials Science and Heat Treatment of Metals

staffCards.name: Loshkariov Dmytro Valeriiovych
staffCards.researchDirection: Modeling of phase-structural transformations, including using methods of non-equilibrium thermodynamics, during cooling of alloyed steels under continuous cooling and isothermal conditions. Predictive determination of mechanical properties of carbon and alloyed steels after heat treatment.
